segments.text: The sound of water running is almost hypnotic until I focus on the puddle forming beneath the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe the woman is standing right in it and doesn’t seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s maddening how she’s so wrapped up in her dishwashing that she completely misses the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is precariously perched on that stool, and I can hardly breathe in anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about all the broken dishes and potential injuries, and it fills me with dread.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, there’s something endearing about the children’s determination to reach those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find myself rooting for them, despite the risks involved.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their little plan seems so innocent, yet I know the dangers lurking in that kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast of their bright spirits against the dullness of the woman’s chores is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: In some ways, it feels like a snapshot of childhood, wild and carefree.
segments.speaker: PAR
